caption.p: The 3D graph shows the predicted and calculated anti-inflammatory activity of selected polycyclic endoperoxides (compound numbers: 1, 8, 9, 68, 94, 95, 96, 97, 98, 100, and 113) showing the highest degree of confidence, i.e., more than 95%. These polycyclic endoperoxides can be used as potential agents with strong anti-inflammatory activity.
